items.title: Pulisic nets in Milan win, on pace for best campaign
items.summary: Christian Pulisic is on pace for the best season of his career -- in a season that will conclude with a home World Cup for the United States.

items.title: Van Dijk: More to come from Wirtz for Liverpool
items.summary: Virgil van Dijk has heaped praise on teammate Florian Wirtz and backed him to continue delivering for Liverpool after he scored his first goal for the club in Saturday's 2-1 victory over Wolverhampton Wanderers.

items.title: √òdegaard: Rice has put Arsenal in charge again
items.summary: Martin Odegaard believes Declan Rice's "unbelievable" performance as an emergency right-back demonstrates that Arsenal are "ready to do whatever it takes" to win the Premier League.

items.title: James: Only Chelsea to blame for Villa collapse
items.summary: Captain Reece James feels Chelsea have themselves to blame after throwing away a half-time lead to lose 2-1 to Aston Villa.

items.title: Calvert-Lewin continues scoring run as Leeds secure point at Sunderland
items.summary: Dominic Calvert-Lewin's incredible goalscoring run continued as he found the net in a sixth consecutive Premier League game to secure Leeds a 1-1 draw at Sunderland.

items.title: Alleen in topvorm verkerende Calvert-Lewin kan Roefs kloppen
items.summary: Robin Roefs heeft met Sunderland in eigen huis een punt gepakt tegen Leeds United. De Nederlandse doelman werd kort na rust geklopt door Dominic Calvert-Lewin die voor het zesde Premier League-duel op rij trefzeker was.

items.title: 'OH Gary, Gary!' | Anderson SO close to nine-darter in tie-break thriller!
items.summary: Gary Anderson misses the double 12 as he almost hits a nine-darter during the tiebreak seventh set against Jermaine Wattimena.

items.title: 'Girona moet WK-droom Ter Stegen redden'
items.summary: Girona heeft zich bij FC Barcelona gemeld voor Marc-Andr√© Ter Stegen. De huidige nummer achttien van de La Liga draait een draak van een seizoen en incasseert de meeste tegentreffers op het hoogste niveau van Spanje. De club is op zoek naar een nieuw doelman en Ter Stegen - die droomt van het WK - kan daar uitkomst voor bieden.

items.title: Read bovenaan in prestigieuze talentenlijst, ook Smit in topvijf
items.summary: Givairo Read is volgens de Zwitserse sportonderzoekers CIES Football Observatory (CIES) het grootste talent buiten de top-5-competities. De rechtsback van Feyenoord houdt in het klassement, van spelers die na 2005 zijn geboren, toptalenten als Geovany Quenda (Sporting Portugal) en Kees Smit (AZ) achter zich.

items.title: 'Cancelo wil terug naar Europa, Portugal en Engeland lonken'
items.summary: In dit blog vind je alle speculaties en bevestigde transfers in het buitenland. Bekijk hier ons blog voor de transferperikelen in Nederland.

items.title: Afcon roundup: Mozambique stun Gabon to end 40-year wait for win
items.summary: Bangal, Catamo and Calila score in 3-2 victory Defeat leaves Gabon‚Äôs hopes hanging by a thread Mozambique ended a 40-year wait for victory at the Africa Cup of Nations as they beat Gabon 3-2 in Agadir. Goals from Faisal Bangal, Geny Catamo and Diogo Calila earned the southern African side a deserved victory in which they were led by 42-year-old winger Elias Pelembe. It is their first win at the continental finals since their debut in 1986 in what was their 17th game. This story will be updated Continue reading...

items.title: Affordale Fury and Sam Ewing strike in the Savills
items.summary: Affordale Fury rallied to great effect to land Grade One honours in the Savills Chase at Leopardstown.

items.title: Teahupoo sweeps to Christmas Hurdle success
items.summary: Teahupoo stamped his authority on the staying division with a dominant performance in the Grade One Christmas Hurdle at Leopardstown.

items.title: Andy Carroll to appear in court after arrest and charge for breaching order
items.summary: Carroll charged with breaching non-molestation order Former England striker due in court on Tuesday The former England striker Andy Carroll has been charged with breaching a non-molestation order and is set to appear in court on Tuesday. Carroll, who was capped nine times by England and played for Newcastle and Liverpool, was arrested in April after allegedly committing an offence the previous month. Continue reading...

items.title: Liverpool set-piece problems a 'killer' - Van Dijk
items.summary: Virgil van Dijk says that Liverpool's problems from set-pieces "hurts" and that the second phase is a "killer" for them.

items.title: Chelsea investigate after bottle thrown at Villa bench
items.summary: Chelsea will look into an incident after a plastic bottle containing what looked like water was thrown at Aston Villa's staff and players.
